item.title: Accor will assume management of the Star Convention Centre in Thailand
item.description:
In 2020, Accor will assume management of the 571-room Star Convention Centre in Thailand, rebranding it as the Novotel Rayong Star Convention Centre. The hotel, situated in Rayong province’s city center, will undergo a significant two-year renovation. The initial phase will focus on revamping public spaces, dining establishments, and 235 guest rooms. Subsequently, the remaining 336 guest rooms will be renovated in the second phase. item.title: Thailand is gaining traction as a top choice for hosting business events
item.description:
Source: TCEB. Thailand, with the Thailand Convention and Exhibition Bureau (TCEB) at the helm, is establishing itself as a prime location for business events. As the Thai government’s primary representative for this sector, TCEB plays a vital role in solidifying Thailand’s leading position in the Asian business events industry and Bangkok’s status as a top-tier destination for international business events.
